channel.title: Stop Dupers? [Delta]
channel.description: So yeah i wanna know how to stop dupers?

item.title: Stop Dupers? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

May not be a spoon feeding Community… But I’m a spoon feeding person lol…

public void declineTrade() {
if (disconnected) {
declineTrade(true);
}
declineTrade(true);
}
public void declineTrade(boolean tellOther) {
client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
if (tellOther && validClient(trade_reqId)) {
other.sM(“Other player has declined the trade.”);
other.declineTrade(false);
}

	for (GameItem item : offeredItems) {
		if (item.amount < 1)
			continue;
		if (item.stackable) {
			addItem(item.id, item.amount);
		} else {
			for (int i = 0; i < item.amount; i++) {
				addItem(item.id, 1);
			}
		}
	}
	canOffer = true;
	tradeConfirmed = false;
	tradeConfirmed2 = false;
	offeredItems.clear();
	inTrade = false;
	trade_reqId = 0;
            other.closeInterface();
	other.inTrade = false;
}

Read full topic

item.description:
@Pray_for_plagues wrote:

If your worried about dupers I would suggest using a different source. Delta is known to have a bunch of dupes in it. I don’t know how to fix them just saying.

item.title: Stop Dupers? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

you can set the commands that dupers use, and set them up like this:

example

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pickup"))
{
if (playerRights > 0)
{
//normal pickup command here...
} else
{
//insert the ban void here... servers vary on this so lol
}
}
